title: ACCOUNTING
de_requirements:
Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes including Economics and one of Accounting, Mathematics, Statistics, Business Management.

 

HND/ND/NCE at Credit/Merit level in relevant programmes/subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and two (2) other relevant subjects.
subjects: Use of English, Mathematics, Economics and any other Social Science subject.

title: BUSINESS MANAGEMENT
de_requirements:
Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes including Economics and one of Accounting, Mathematics, Statistics, Business Management.

 

HND/ND/NCE at Credit/Merit level in relevant programmes/subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and two (2) Art, Commercial or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Use of English, Mathematics, Economics and any other Social Science subject.

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE
de_requirements:
Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in sciences subjects, including Mathematics.

 

HND/ND/NCE at Credit/Merit level in relevant programmes/subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Physics and two (2) other Science subjects.
subjects: Use of English, Mathematics, Physics and one (1) of Biology, Chemistry, Agricultural Science, Economics and Geography.

title: CYBER SECURITY
de_requirements:
Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in sciences subjects, including Mathematics.

 

HND/ND/NCE at Credit/Merit level in relevant programmes/subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Physics and two (2) other Science subjects.
subjects: Use of English, Mathematics, Physics and one (1) of Biology, Chemistry, Agricultural Science, Economics and Geography.

title: DATA SCIENCE
de_requirements:
Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes including Economics and one of Accounting, Mathematics, Statistics, Business Management.

 

HND/ND/NCE at Credit/Merit level in relevant programmes/subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Physics and two (2) other Science subjects.
subjects: Use of English, Mathematics, Physics and one (1) of Biology, Chemistry, Agricultural Science, Economics and Geography.

title: ECONOMICS
de_requirements:
Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes including Economics and one of Accounting, Mathematics, Statistics, Business Management, Geography, History, Government.

 

HND/ND/NCE at Credit/Merit level in relevant programmes/subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and two (2) Art, Commercial or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Use of English, Mathematics, Economics and any other Social Science subject.

title: NURSING SCIENCE
de_requirements: Registered Nurse Certificate (RN) and the required five subjects at SSC.
utme_requirements: Five SSC credit passes including Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, Biology and English Language at not more than two sittings.

title: PUBLIC HEALTH
de_requirements:
National Diploma in Science Laboratory Technology, Diploma in

Medical Laboratory Science, Diploma Dental Technology, Community Health Extension Workers, and other candidates such as Registered Nurses and Registered Midwives.


Five SSSC (or equivalent) credit passes in relevant subjects, two of which are at the Advanced Level.
utme_requirements: Five credit passes at the SSC in English Language, Mathematics, Biology or Health Science, Chemistry, Physics.

title: PUBLIC POLICY AND ADMINISTRATION
de_requirements:
Two (2) A' level/IJMB/JUPEB passes in Economics and Government/History/Social Studies/Sociology.

HND/ND/NCE at Credit/Merit level in relevant programmes/subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC O'Level credit passes to include English Language,  Economics or Government or History or Civic Education. Candidates must obtain at least a pass in Mathematics.
subjects: Use of English, Government, Economics and any other subject.

title: SOFTWARE ENGINEERING
de_requirements:
Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in sciences subjects, including Mathematics.

 

HND/ND/NCE at Credit/Merit level in relevant programmes/subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Physics and two (2) other Science subjects.
subjects: Use of English, Mathematics, Physics and one (1) of Biology, Chemistry, Agricultural Science, Economics and Geography.
